casebody.data:
John STRANO et al.
v.
Darwyn AZZINARO et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 29, 2019 John R. Williams, in support of the petition. Stephen P. Brown and Nicole R. Cuglietto, in opposition.

The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 183 , 204 A.3d 705 (2019), is granted, limited to the following issue:

"Did the Appellate Court correctly determine that the trial court properly granted the defendants' motion to strike the plaintiffs' revised complaint for failure to state a claim of intentional infliction of emotional distress?"
